testcase.name: verifyEmployeeInfoInAllAndOtherTabs

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Verify that number of employees match between All tab and sum of other tabs. expected [119] but found [124], Verify that employee names and departments are listed correctly between All tab and Department tabs for the Employee Name:=AMANDA GRADY Department:=Partner Growth expected [false] but found [true], Verify that employee names and departments are listed correctly between All tab and Department tabs for the Employee Name:=AMANDA VANDIVER Department:=Partner Growth expected [false] but found [true], Verify that employee names and departments are listed correctly between All tab and Department tabs for the Employee Name:=MARK WEILER Department:=Engineering expected [false] but found [true], Verify that employee names and departments are listed correctly between All tab and Department tabs for the Employee Name:=VATSAL BAJPAI Department:=Engineering expected [false] but found [true], Verify that employee names and departments are listed correctly between All tab and Department tabs for the Employee Name:=YEN HOANG Department:=Engineering expected [false] but found [true]
